headline: Why Citizens Financial Group (CFG) Is Down 7.8% After Inflation Data Spurs Regional Bank Credit Fears
summary: In recent days, Citizens Financial Group has been swept up in a wider pullback in regional bank stocks amid hotter-than-expected inflation data and mounting concerns about rising credit risks. This sector-wide stress highlights how worries over problem loans and borrower creditworthiness can weigh on banks like Citizens regardless of their individual initiatives. Now we’ll examine how these renewed inflation and credit-risk worries might reshape Citizens Financial Group’s multi-year...
